sage.scene.shape

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.scene.SceneNode
      • sage.scene.Leaf
        • sage.scene.shape.Polygon3D
          • sage.scene.shape.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends Polygon3D
    Rectangle defines a Polygon3D which is a rectangle with its four corners positioned symmetrically about the origin at the center of the rectangle.
    Author:
    John Clevenger

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(java.lang.String name,
                 float width,
                 float height)
        Constructs a Rectangle centered at the origin with the specified name and of the specified width and height, and a default color of Color.white. By default the rectangle has no texture object attached to it. The Rectangle is assigned a BoundingVolume of type BoundingSphere. By default the Rectangle lies flat in the Z = 0 plane (that is, it is aligned with the X and Y axes).
        Parameters:
        width - -- the width of the rectangle
        height - -- the height of the rectangle

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(IRenderer renderer)
        Description copied from class: Polygon3D
        Draws this Polygon3D.
        Overrides:
        draw in class Polygon3D
        Parameters:

      • contains

        public boolean contains(graphicslib3D.Point3D p)
        Returns true if the specified point, expected to be in world coordinates, lies within the bounds of this Rectangle. Note that the test for "containment" does not use the Rectangle's "bounding volume" (if any); rather, this method transforms the specified world coordinate point into local coordinates using the inverse of the Rectangle's current world transform (that is, the Matrix3D returned by SceneNode.getWorldTransform()) and then compares the resulting local point with the width/height boundaries of the Rectangle.
        Parameters:
        p - - a Point3D in world coordinates
        Returns:
        true if the point lies inside the Rectangle

      • updateLocalBound

        public void updateLocalBound()
        Updates the local bound of this Rectangle (that is, computes a new BoundingVolume for the Rectangle and assigns it to the Rectangle. The new BoundingVolume is a BoundingSphere centered at the local origin and with a radius computed by taking the distance to one corner of the (unscaled) Rectangle.
        Overrides:
        updateLocalBound in class Polygon3D

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class SceneNode
